title: Account Banned
body: earlyer this day i made a discussion of my acc got hacked and here now my acc is perm banned and it says that tyhere should be a email but there isnt a email and i dont know what to do do pls help me riot :(

replies.body: Hey, your account was provided a security lock to prevent unauthorized access.  Hit up our account team through an [account recovery form](https://support.riotgames.com/hc/en-us/requests/new?ticket_form_id=72416) and we'll help get you squared away!

An account being detected does cause the account to be banned, but it's a shield ban to protect the account from further damage.

Contact player support _while logged out of the boards_ through here:
https://support.riotgames.com/hc/en-us/requests/new
and select "I need help recovering my account."

Once they verify you're the true owner and the account is in safe hands again they will unban it.
